item.description: Love that British/Irish sense of humour? Looking for someone to go to the pub with on a Friday night? Like Indian food? Afternoon tea, anyone? Want to talk about how David Cameron is doing or watch the FA Cup final with friends? Then join this not so new but recently revived Meetup group and meet other fascinating British, Irish and Europeans  (30+) for conversation, dinner, pub outings, Brit/European movies and more in Boston and on the North Shore! Please note slight change of emphasis - the group is meant to provide a venue for homesick Brits and Europeans to get together socially.  I'm changing also from a strictly "Singles" group  - Brit/Euro couples (or part Brit/ Euro) looking to meet others who get their jokes are welcome too!
item.name: North Shore Brits & Euros
